000000_00000_00000_01000_00000_100000 // add $t0, $0, $0   		
001000_00000_01001_0000000000001010   // addi $t1, $0, 10
101011_01000_00000_0000000000000000   // sw $r0, 0($t0)
101011_01000_01001_0000000000000100   // sw $t1, 4($t0)
100011_01000_01101_0000000000000100   // lw $t5, 4($t0)
000000_01101_01001_01111_00000_100000 // add $t7, $t5, $t1       (hazard!)  
001000_00000_01010_0000000000001101   // addi $t2, $0, 13        (stall 1 cycle)
000000_01001_01001_01011_00000_011000 // mul $t3, $t1, $t1
